sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_62500_mealplan_recipe"> <x_62500_mealplan_recipe action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>true</active> <cook_time>1970-01-01 00:20:00</cook_time> <cooking_instructions>1. Heat vegetable oil in a skillet over medium-high heat. 2. Season thinly sliced beef sirloin with salt and pepper. 3. Cook beef slices until browned and cooked to desired doneness. 4. In a small bowl, whisk together lime juice, fish sauce, brown sugar, minced garlic, and minced bird's eye chili to make the dressing. 5. In a large bowl, combine mixed greens, thinly sliced cucumber, halved cherry tomatoes, thinly sliced red onion, mint leaves, and cilantro. 6. Add cooked beef slices to the salad. 7. Pour dressing over the salad and toss to combine. 8. Serve immediately.</cooking_instructions> <cuisine display_value="Thai">8b495a179791021069a3b6fce053afd0</cuisine> <diet/> <effort display_value="Moderate">bee0a76e9730021069a3b6fce053af3e</effort> <image/> <ingredients/> <meal_type display_value="Dinner">ca8516df9751021069a3b6fce053afdf</meal_type> <name>Thai Beef Salad</name> <nutrition>Calories: 400, Protein: 25g, Fat: 20g, Carbs: 30g</nutrition> <owned_by display_value="MP Admin">cbb877e697b0021069a3b6fce053af41</owned_by> <pre_cook>false</pre_cook> <prep_instructions>1. Thinly slice beef sirloin. 2. Thinly slice cucumber and red onion. 3. Halve cherry tomatoes. 4. Mince garlic and bird's eye chili.</prep_instructions> <prep_required>false</prep_required> <prep_time>1970-01-01 00:15:00</prep_time> <serving>2</serving> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2024-04-07 01:56:01</sys_created_on> <sys_id>ce5917d797d5021069a3b6fce053afdd</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2024-05-01 06:39:11</sys_updated_on> <time_of_day/> </x_62500_mealplan_recipe> </record_update>
